spec_data.Name: pykickstart
spec_data.Description:
Python utilities for manipulating kickstart files.  The Python 2 and 3 libraries
can be found in the packages python-kickstart and python3-kickstart
respectively.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 12 Oct 2017 02:45:38 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Python utilities for manipulating kickstart files.
